text: emanisa janathawa yahapath paththata yomu wuna.eeth atham rupawahini nalika saha guwan widuli nalika me pelambaawima ayahapath paththata anubala dena ayurin pracharaya karanawa.

ada samahara mawpiyan boho wita daruwanata boho thahanchi damana athara prashnayak asu wita oowa ‘maha gon prashna’ kiya prathi uththara dena ayuru nirantharayen dakagatha hakiya.

ohu kiyanne amarasekara wisin kiyana paridi me rate pawathi sanskruthika sadhakaya kerehi bandaranayakage awadhanaya yomuwuwata amatharawa ethek pawathi anekuth wadagath thathwayak wana 1930 pasuwa mulika washayen mathuwi pamini gunasinhage ha samahara anekuth nayakayange wyapruthinda athulath merata wame wyaparaye samahara padanam kerehi bandaranayakage thibu sanwedanayayi.
kese wethath kamhale nishpadana katayuthu sandaha awashyaya upakaranayak wasara 1 1/2 ka kalayak thula aluthwadiya nokirima hethuwen wishala aadayamak ahimi wi athi bawa kiyaweyi.
mata me kathawa kiyewwata passe mathak une.
wishwawidyala saha widyagnyayan ohu shatha pahakata ganan no ganne ee nisa ya.

ee thamayi me gamane hinimanga.
mata athule darshana labuna.
kabok pashana thiraya no gambauru sagaraye gilennata aththe ehi pa්rathipalayak hatiyata ya.
ee purokathana karapu daththa anusarayen dainikawa, sathipatha, ee wagema chandra masayata galapena sathi hathare daththa gana kiyanna puluwan.
athata weralu ahidagene inata pala nelagene baratama dara kadagene daruwa wenuwen mawa wehesena ayuru dakwena mema kawiya pawa eyata sadhaka sapayayi.
oba atasil samadan wu dawasaka awasthawaka obe sitha thulata wairaya, kopaya, dweshaya athi nowanna puluwan.
ee hariye para ayine loku humbaahak thibuna.
pemwathunge dinaya wu nisawen owunta mage awadhanayata yomu wannedayi mama nodanimi.
